titleStmt.title: To the Generous, Ingenious, and Judicious, Sir WALTER VAVASOR Knight and Baronet; together with his Vettuously accom∣plished Lady: R. B. Zealously consecrates this Christian Diall.

publicationStmt.publisher: To the Reader: The English Preface in Print, c. 1475-1640 / Early English Books Online Text Creation Partnership

analytic.title: To the Generous, Ingenious, and Judicious, Sir WALTER VAVASOR Knight and Baronet; together with his Vettuously accom∣plished Lady: R. B. Zealously consecrates this Christian Diall.

monogr.title: A spiritual spicerie : containing sundrie sweet tractates of devotion and piety. By Ri. Brathwait, Esq
monogr.author: Brathwait, Richard

div.head: To the Generous, Ingenious, and Judicious, Sir WALTER VAVASOR Knight and Baronet; together with his Vettuously accomplished Lady: R. B. Zealously consecrates this Christian Diall.

lg.l: To your Grand-father have I welcom bin,
Receive this Gage in memory of him;
Whil'st no Sun-Diall may more truly give
The houre oth' day, than this the way to live.
